dialogue: I know I should be happy for him... But, when I think of the fact that I'll never see him again, I can't help tears.
Tell me outsider, is this my lack of faith?

dialogue.name: Faith has nothing to do with it

dialogue: I see. You think like an outsider, so I don't expect you to understand. Faith is what keeps this place whole.
Ofcourse, I must ask for forgiveness. I've sinned in my heart. I must- but it just- it just hurts so much.
No? Yes, it is only natural to feel this way. My heart is prone to sin, and there is only one who is sinless.
